original_title: Cork n' Bottle String Band: The Ken's Bar Story
overview: This down-home documentary celebrates Madison, Wis., bluegrass outfit the Cork n' Bottle String Band, from their days rehearsing in a liquor store to their popular weekly shows at Ken's Bar, a neighborhood tavern where they played for free beer. Featuring interviews with the band and many of their true-blue fans, the program reveals the blend of goofy humor and good-time music that turned them into local celebrities.
title: Cork n' Bottle String Band: The Ken's Bar Story
